SENT.plain: The Shengxue Syrup (SXS) composed of Chinese medicinal herbs for invigorating the function of Spleen and resplenishing the Kidney was used in treating 115 chronic aplastic anemia patients
The SXS group consisted of 67 patients
After the median 20 months treatment the total effective rate (TER) was 97.0%
The other group was SXS + testosterone group consisted of 48 patients
After median 17.5 month treatment the TER was 95.8%
The difference of TER between two groups was insignificant
The result of animal experiment showed that SXS could markedly enhance the hematopoietic stem cells as well as progenitor cells proliferation of bone marrow in mice
